mapper.select: select TB_USER.ID, PHONE, PASSWORD, TB_USER.NICK, EMAIL, REG_DT, TB_USER.MBTI, ADMIN_YN, INTRO, PRIVATE_YN, PROF_IMG, BACK_IMG, BOARD_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT_CNT, CATEGORY, LIKE_CNT, CREATE_DT, IMG_NUM, ORIGINAL_NM, FILE_SIZE, SAVED_NM from TB_USER, (select TB_BOARD.BOARD_NUM, TITLE, ID, NICK, CONTENT, HIT_CNT, CATEGORY, MBTI, LIKE_CNT, CREATE_DT, IMG_NUM, ORIGINAL_NM, FILE_SIZE, SAVED_NM from TB_BOARD, TB_BOARD_IMG where TB_BOARD.BOARD_NUM = TB_BOARD_IMG.BOARD_NUM) where TB_USER.ID = #{ID}

SELECT SEQ_TB_BOARD_BOARD_NUM.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into TB_BOARD ( BOARD_NUM, TITLE, ID, NICK, CONTENT, HIT_CNT, CREATE_DT, CATEGORY, MBTI, LIKE_CNT) VALUES ( #{BOARD_NUM}, #{TITLE}, #{ID}, #{NICK}, #{CONTENT}, 0, SYSDATE, #{CATEGORY}, #{MBTI}, 0)

mapper.select: select IMG_NUM, ORIGINAL_NM, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) as FILE_SIZE from TB_BOARD_IMG where BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
